description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国职业外交官，中国共产党党员。现任中华人民共和国外交部新闻司副司长、外交部发言人。
description.en: A professional diplomat of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China. He currently serves as the Deputy Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and a spokesperson for the ministry.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部发言人

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部发言人
en: Spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部设立的新闻发言人制度，是中华人民共和国建立的第一个政府发言人制度。
description.en: The spokesperson system established by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China, which is the first government spokesperson system established in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，现任外交部新闻司副司长、发言人。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as Deputy Director-General and spokesperson of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，现任外交部新闻司副司长、发言人。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, currently serving as Deputy Director-General and spokesperson of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官和政治人物，现任中共中央政治局委员、中央外办主任、外交部部长。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat and politician, currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee, Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, and Minister of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省省会。
description.en: The capital of Hubei Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于湖北省武汉市的一所中学。
description.en: A secondary school located in Wuhan, Hubei.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所高等院校。
description.en: An institution of higher education located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国新疆维吾尔自治区的一个特殊社会组织，实行党政军企合一体制。
description.en: A special social organization in the Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region of the People's Republic of China, which implements an integrated system of party, government, military, and enterprise.
